thread.title: NASCAR community reacts to Cup Series race at Atlanta
thread.title_full: NASCAR community reacts to Cup Series race at Atlanta

title: NASCAR community reacts to Cup Series race at Atlanta
text: Mar 6, 2017 at 9:31a ET 0Shares Sunday’s Folds of Honor QuikTrip 500 at Atlanta Motor Speedway looked like a runaway victory for Kevin Harvick, until a late-race pit-road speeding penalty allowed Brad Keselowski to score the victory for Team Penske. In general, the first use of NASCAR’s low-downforce package was a success, as drivers fought ill-handling race cars all day long, with lots of dicing in the pack. Here’s some of the best social reaction from the racing community following the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series’ lone visit to Atlanta this year. Shanna Lockwood Shanna Lockwood-USA TODAY Sports
